downloadTitle: Set up Lync Online external communications – admin email template
downloadDescription: If you want to communicate with external Lync users, you’ll need to make sure the admin in the other organization has set up external communications as well.
detailsSection: If you want to let your Lync users IM and talk with Lync contacts in other organizations, and also to Skype users who are signed in with a Microsoft account (formerly Windows Live ID), you’ll need to make sure the admin in the other organization has set up external communications as well. Use this email template to contact the admin in the other organization.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: let Lync Online Users communicate outside your organization
